text: Salko Bukvarević (20 April 1967 - 29 July 2020) was a Bosnian politician and soldier. He was the Minister for Veterans and Disabled Veterans between 2015 to 2020. In 1990, Bukvarević was one of the founders of the Party of Democratic Action. During the Yugoslav Wars he served in the Bosnian army and was one of the founders of the Patriotic League paramilitary unit. He was born in Gornje Hrasno, Kalesija, SRBH, SFRY. He died on 29 July 2020 in Sarajevo, Bosnia and Herzegovina from COVID-19 at the age of 53. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Bosnia and Herzegovina Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina politicians
title: Salko Bukvarević
